property.name: title
property.label: Title
property.description: Clearly identifies the site, service or product.

property.name: intro
property.label: Intro
property.description: Gives additional context for the search when the title alone may not be insufficient.
property.default: Find information, access services and have your say.

property.name: links
property.label: Links
property.description: Surfaces access to popular search content - as a series of Markdown links.

property.name: srLabel
property.label: Label
property.description: Text used to label the search input field.

property.name: showLabel
property.label: Show label
property.description: Will make the label visible vs. keeping it for screenreaders only.

property.name: srSearchButtonLabel
property.label: Search button label

property.label: Search button style

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
